text: "We're Not Gonna Sleep Tonight" is a 2001 song by Emma Bunton. It is the third and final single from her debut solo studio album A Girl Like Me (2001). It went to number 20 in the United Kingdom and number 27 in Romania and Scotland. The music video was directed by Phil Griffin. == References == Category:2001 songs Category:Emma Bunton songs Category:Pop songs
title: We're Not Gonna Sleep Tonight
